title: Requirements Phase: mcp-server-manager - Ready for Review
response:
Feedback Summary (4 comments):

Specific Text Comments:
1. "4. IF server environment variables contain sensiti...": IRRELEVANT in a single-user-use application
2. "terminal-style interface": do not mention specific styles - just basic FUNCTIONAL UI implementation
3. "a monospace font with a dark terminal-style color ...": do not mention specific styles - just basic FUNCTIONAL UI implementation
4. "### Performance

- Application startup time should...": irrelevant - defaults are acceptable.

comments.selectedText: 4. IF server environment variables contain sensitive data THEN the application SHALL mask values containing "key", "token", "secret", "password", or "auth" patterns

comments.comment: do not mention specific styles - just basic FUNCTIONAL UI implementation
do not mention specific styles - just basic FUNCTIONAL UI implementation
comments.selectedText: a monospace font with a dark terminal-style color scheme (black background, green text)

### Performance

- Application startup time should be under 2 seconds on modern macOS systems
- Configuration file reads/writes should complete within 500ms for typical file sizes
- UI refresh operations should complete within 100ms to maintain responsive user experience
- Memory usage should remain under 100MB during normal operation
